metadata.title: CVE-2018-6106 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An asynchronous generator may return an incorrect state in V8 in GoogleChrome prior to 66.0.3359.117 allowing a remote attacker to potentiallyexploit object corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
